description: Drawing on decades of experience designing premium hiking boots, Danner originally created the Vertigo boot in 2009. The Vertigo 917 combines classic styling and innovation in a new, modernized boot. The technical Vibram® midsole and outsole, full-grain leather upper and waterproof Gore-Tex® liner make the Vertigo 917 the ideal boot for the urban explorer.
name: Danner Vertigo 917 - Mens

specs.value: To ensure its quality, Danner puts the leather through six different tests before making a selection. Danner's full-grain leathers are the strongest and most durable form of leather
100% waterproof and breathable, Gore-Tex liners ensure that no water gets in, while allowing sweat and moisture to get out
Three layers of varying density are combined for maximum cushioning and support. The entire footbed is made of open-cell polyurethane for better heat dissipation and air circulation
This rubberized EVA midsole maintains the same cushioning properties as traditional EVA, but is more durable and won’t break down as easily. This technology enhances rebound, comfort and support
Exclusive outsole for Danner featuring XS Trek rubber compound for an optimal balance of durability and traction in wet conditions on the trail or city streets.

Combining traditional stitchdown technique with cup sole construction that allows the boot to keep a wider platform while eliminating the need for a buffed sidewall. This gives these sneaker boots a modern aesthetic and lightweight, flexible finish
